title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year
Average attendance is roughly constant from 2008 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Average attendance about 62358.0 was recorded at Year 2013
Min Average attendance about 60368.0 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2011 to 2014.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
